alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 8:10AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson, Gulf, Bay, Calhoun and eastern Holmes Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida, Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida and southwestern Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 945 AM EST/845 AM CST/... At 809 AM EST/709 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Cottonwood to near Bonifay to 10 miles southwest of Panama City Beach. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Bonifay, Blountstown, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Parker and Malone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon EST/1100 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
